A world of endless possibilities: With the ability to see in the dark, humans could explore and discover new things in the night that were previously hidden. This could lead to new scientific discoveries, technological advancements, and even new ways of life.
A change in our social norms: Our society would have to adjust to the new normal of people being able to see in the dark. This could lead to changes in the way we work, play, and live our lives.

A change in our fear of the unknown: Humans have always been afraid of the dark, but if we could see in the dark, we would no longer be afraid. This could lead to a change in our perception of the world and our place in it.

A change in our communication: The ability to see in the dark would allow us to communicate with each other in new ways. We could have conversations in the dark, read books in the dark, and even watch movies in the dark.

A change in our transportation: With the ability to see in the dark, we could travel in the dark without the need for artificial light. This could lead to a new form of transportation that is more environmentally friendly and energy efficient.
